question: What type of practical project will students undertake in this course?
response: The final project for the Natural Language Processing and Large Language Models course involves designing and implementing a chatbot. This chatbot should specialize in answering questions about the course content and related information, while also being able to handle out-of-context queries appropriately. The deliverables include the complete chatbot code and a detailed report explaining the design choices, implemented methodologies, and justification for the chosen tools and technologies.
